file_content.text: Well, well. Look at the incredible job I've done clearing out those gangsters. Mayor Martik's gonna be mighty generous with his rewards....
Course, he'll be very disappointed to hear that you all couldn't resist stealing his ore and selling it on the black market.
Course, he'll be appalled to hear a Jedi like yourself couldn't keep from fleeing with the merchandise.
And I don't think he'll be even a little surprised to hear you couldn't resist running off with his merchandise.
Course, he'll be a mite stung to hear that such an upstanding citizen took off with his ore.
But at least he'll know I held up my end of the bargain.
I am a Jedi. No one would take your word over mine!
Your greed blinds you.
Do you think you have the credibility it would take to frame a Jedi?
This is unwise.
Dead Jedi are pretty easy to frame.
I cleared out those thugs while you sat on your rump. You can't change that now.
You're not taking my credit.
Sure I can. Long as no one's around to contradict me....
Of all the lazy, rotten, underhanded schemes.... Why didn't I think of that?
You want to take my credit?
Ha! I like you. Too bad I can't have you running around telling people I'm a liar.
Huh?
I'm talking about how you came blundering in after I had driven off the Twin Suns, and stole the merchandise I was going to return to Mayor Martik.
My boys'll get that wrapped up later.
And I'm gonna make sure nobody can contradict that story...
You won't get away with that.
That's assuming you'll be alive....
My boys'll back me up. I was the one who single-handedly cleared the Twin Suns from this mine, right?
What the--? Oh, blast it! Boys! There's another of them Twin Suns droids here! Hurry!
